about_the_game:
Fantasy Dreamland is a world of fantastical characters, animals, beautiful colors and monsters. Most of all, it's a world of limitless imagination where you can make your own world. Fantasy Dreamland is a DLC Series with add-on packs available to expand your worlds!

Fantasy Dreamland Explorer Pack is an add-on for Fantasy Dreamland Starter Pack. We highly recommend getting the Starter Pack first!

This asset pack contains tilesets and boss enemies sprites! Make your game standout with Fantasy Dreamland!

Contents:

- Dungeon tilesets!
- Marshland tilesets!
- Castle tilesets!
- Desert Houses tilesets!
- Bosses sprites!
- 20 new character sprites!
- Over 3,200 tiles!
- Over 200 animated tiles!
- Multiple type of ground tiles, wall tiles, and props for dungeons!
- Animated marshlands tiles!
- Animated poison stones!
- 5 boss sprites with side view battlers!
- 4 variations of each boss sprites!
- 20 total boss sprites with side view battlers!

Important Note:

* The screenshots are only examples of the asset pack used on a game that has the entire Fantasy Dreamland collection, some of the tiles may not be included on this single asset pack and may be part of another Fantasy Dreamland asset pack.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
